page.title: 11Our School by Michael
page.content: My school will be sixty years old next year. Before that there was an even older school in Branton which was in the building just across the yard from this school. This school has 28 children in it. It is very friendly. We get quite a lot of visitors especially at the 'Open Assembly' which is held once a month. There are two teachers and two classes. We have a front playground, a back playground and a field. But we can't go on the field just now because the bulls and cows got in from the next door field and made a mess. They also knocked the goal posts down. My favourite thing at this school is practising my tables on the computer. Right now I am on Mixed Tables. I also like P.E. on the apparatus. We have to do P.E. in the classroom because we do not have a school hall.
